body: Unzipped: Gay Armenia reviews a documentary from three years ago on homosexuality in Russia. However, the blog notes, two of the gay men documented in the film are Armenians and concludes that it would be useful to screen the film in Armenia proper.

title: Armenia: Gay Russia

sentence: Unzipped: Gay Armenia reviews a documentary from three years ago on homosexuality in Russia.
However, the blog notes, two of the gay men documented in the film are Armenians and concludes that it would be useful to screen the film in Armenia proper.
